original_text: The Lord says: You must do things that are right and fair. Punish those who rob other people. Help the people that they have hurt. Do not be cruel to foreigners who are living among you. Do not cheat them. Do not hurt or cheat widows, or children who have no family. Stop killing people who have not done anything wrong.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 너희가 정의와 공의를 행하여 탈취 당한 자를 압박하는 자의 손에서 건지고 이방인과 고아와 과부를 압제하거나 학대하지 말며 이 곳에서 무죄한 피를 흘리지 말라

sentences.original_text: You must do things that are right and fair.
Punish those who rob other people.
Help the people that they have hurt.
Do not be cruel to foreigners
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에 사는 외국인에게 잔인하지 말라.

sentences.original_text: Do not hurt or cheat widows,
or children who have no family.
sentences.korean_translation: 가족이 없는 아이들을 해치거나 속이지 말라.

sentences.original_text: Stop killing people who have not done anything wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 죄 없는 사람을 죽이는 것을 멈춰라.
